scripts.dev: rm -rd mini; nodemon --watch "src/**" --ext "ts,json,mts,cts,html,css" --ignore "src/**/*.spec.ts" --exec "tsc;cp -r src/static dist;cp -r src/public dist;node --experimental-modules --es-module-specifier-resolution=node dist/index.js"
scripts.build: tsc;npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.js" -eo mini -x .js;npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.mjs" -eo mini -x .mjs;npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.cjs" -eo mini -x .cjs;cp -r src/static mini;cp -r src/public mini;rm mini/**/*.*ts
